      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A partközeli területek élővilága</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Ecosystem Of Coastal Areas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Oekosystem Von Küstenbereichen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'Écosystème des Zones Côtières</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Ecosystem De Áreas Litorais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Ecosistema Delle Zone costiere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το οικοσύστημα των παράκτιων περιοχών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Ecosistema De Áreas Costeras</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A tengerek partközeli területeinek élővilága - életfeltételek a partközeli területeken; szivacsok, csalánozók, porcos és csontos halak, cetek (bálnák, delfinek); korallszirtek élővilága</string>
            <string language="en-US">Ecosystem of Seas near the Coast - Conditions of Living; Sponges, Cnidaria, Cartilaginous and Teleostean Fish, Catecea (Whales, Dolphins); Ecosystem of Coral Reefs</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biom</string>
            <string language="en-US">biome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">tengerek</string>
            <string language="en-US">seas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">óceánok</string>
            <string language="en-US">oceans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">partközeli területek</string>
            <string language="en-US">beachfront areas</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oekosystem von Meeren nahe der Küste - Zustände
des Lebens; Schwamm-, Cnidaria, knorpelige und Teleostean 
Fische, Catecea (Wale, Delphine); Oekosystem der Korallenriffe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écosystème des mers près de la côte - états 
de la vie ; Poissons d'éponges, de Cnidaria, cartilagineux et 
de Teleostean, Catecea (baleines, dauphins) ; Écosystème des 
récifs de corail</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ecosystem dos mares perto da costa - condições 
de viver; Peixes das esponjas, do Cnidaria, os cartilaginous e 
do Teleostean, Catecea (baleias, golfinhos); Ecosystem dos 
recifes corais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ecosistema dei mari vicino al litorale - stati di 
vivere; Pesci cartilaginosi e di Teleostean delle spugne, di 
Cnidaria, Catecea (balene, delfini); Ecosistema dei reefs di 
corallo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικοσύστημα των θαλασσών κοντά στην ακτή - όροι  
Σφουγγάρια, Cnidaria, χόνδρινος και Teleostean ψάρια, 
Catecea (φάλαινες, δελφίνια)  Οικοσύστημα των 
κοραλλιογενών υφάλων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ecosistema de los mares cerca de la costa - 
condiciones de vivir; Pescados de las esponjas, de Cnidaria, 
cartilaginosos y de Teleostean, Catecea (ballenas, delfines); 
Ecosistema de los filones coralinos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">biome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
